original_text: And Jesus said unto them, Verily I say unto you, That ye which have followed me, in the regeneration when the Son of man shall sit in the throne of his glory, ye also shall sit upon twelve thrones, judging the twelve tribes of Israel.
korean_text: 예수께서 이르시되 내가 진실로 너희에게 이르노니 세상이 새롭게 되어 인자가 자기 영광의 보좌에 앉을 때에 나를 따르는 너희도 열두 보좌에 앉아 이스라엘 열두 지파를 심판하리라

sentences.original_text: That ye which have followed me
when the Son of man shall sit in the throne of his glory
sentences.korean_translation: 인자가 자기 영광의 보좌에 앉을 때

sentences.original_text: ye also shall sit upon twelve thrones
judging the twelve tribes of Israel
